channel.title: Need some Vps Help ! Please help me
channel.description:
Hello i Bought a vps yesterday and i got a confirmation email today and im wondering how to set it up
Here are the errors i get when i try to connect to it with Remote Desktop :
1) Remote Access to the server is not enabled 2) The Remote computer is Turned off 3) The Remote computer is not available on the network
Someone please help :) i really need it i turned the vps on aswell

item.title: Need some Vps Help ! Please help me
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

Im helping him. He forgot to install it, so I’m getting it fixed >.>

Read full topic
